        Returns:
        the list of CCC assets

      • getCCCAssets

                               boolean orderByActivationDate)
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - the taxonomy tag for which to get the associated ccc assets
        orderByActivationDate - whether to return the list of assets sorted by activation time
        Returns:
        the list of CCC assets

      • getParentCCCAssets

        List<CCCAsset<?>> getParentCCCAssets(STProduct product,
                                     List<com.day.cq.tagging.Tag> taxonomies,
                                     int level)
        Get associated assets to parent products on given levels. E.g. if product is RPN and level is 3, then get assets for RPN+1, RPN+2, RPN+3 level parents.
        Parameters:
        product - - STProduct for which parents assets will be found
        taxonomies - - list of the taxonomy tags for which to get the associated ccc assets
        level - - level of parent products
        Returns:
        list of associated to parent products assets

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • reclassify

        void reclassify(CCCAsset<?> asset,
                com.day.cq.tagging.Tag tag,
                boolean autoSave)
        reclassify the CCCAsset from one tag to another need to re-modify the implementation later to adjust to different structures of assets
        Parameters:
        asset - the asset to reclassify
        tag - the new tag of the asset
        autoSave - whether the session should be automatically saved or not
